title: Problems in Champ Select
body: Ever since the dark star update, whenever I try to play a game, and go into champ select, it wont let me pick my champions even though they show up. By the end of champ select when the timer runs out, a message pops up on my screen saying 'there was a problem in selecting your champion. Please try again'. Also sometimes it says 'Trying to reconnect'  and that also goes on till the champ select timer run out. I have been put into low priority queue twice because of these problem now. I have tried re-downloading my client, but that didn't help at all, instead got me stuck on the MSI invitational loading screen. If any knows how to fix these problems please comment it below.

replies.body: I'm still experiencing the 'Trying to Reconnect' issue, but that's most happening on the loading screen after champ select now. I am also now having random disconnections and  login problems, that even after I have restarted my computer multiple times it still wont let me login. I have tried the D.N.S and firewall troubleshooting options before I posted this, but I had to change my D.N.S option back to auto connect because of issues. I can't have a wired connection because there is no plug for the router where my PC setup is located but I will try to play league another computer which is located closer to the router and see the game run better. I also can't open ports for my router because only my dad knows the username and password for to login. I am not using any V.P.N or Proxy connections.

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Sounds to me to be connection related, could you please run through the "[Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)" support article for me and let me know if anything helps.
